get.summary: Check API server status
get.description: Check API server status

200.description: Status OK

get.summary: Get the current price of any cryptocurrencies in any other supported currencies that you need.
get.description:
Note: to check if a price is stale, please flag `include_last_updated_at=true` to get the latest updated time. You may also flag `include_24hr_change=true` to check if it returns 'null' value.

Cache / Update Frequency: every 60 seconds  (every 30 seconds for Pro API)

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: id of coins, comma-separated if querying more than 1 coin *refers to `coins/list`

parameters.name: vs_currencies
parameters.description: vs_currency of coins, comma-separated if querying more than 1 vs_currency *refers to `simple/supported_vs_currencies`

parameters.name: include_market_cap
parameters.description: true/false to include market_cap, default: false

parameters.name: include_24hr_vol
parameters.description: true/false to include 24hr_vol, default: false

parameters.name: include_24hr_change
parameters.description: true/false to include 24hr_change, default: false

parameters.name: include_last_updated_at
parameters.description: true/false to include last_updated_at of price, default: false

parameters.name: precision
parameters.description: full or any value between 0 - 18 to specify decimal place for currency price value

200.description: price(s) of cryptocurrency

get.summary: Get current price of tokens (using contract addresses) for a given platform in any other currency that you need.
get.description: This endpoint allows you to query a token price by using contract address. It returns the global average price that is aggregated across all active exchanges on CoinGecko. It does not return the price of a specific network, you may cross-check the price on CoinGecko.com. Learn more about our price methodology here. Cache / Update Frequency: every 60 seconds (every 30 seconds for Pro API)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the platform issuing tokens (See asset_platforms endpoint for list of options)

parameters.name: contract_addresses
parameters.description: The contract address of tokens, comma separated

parameters.name: vs_currencies
parameters.description: vs_currency of coins, comma-separated if querying more than 1 vs_currency *refers to `simple/supported_vs_currencies`

parameters.name: include_market_cap
parameters.description: true/false to include market_cap, default: false

parameters.name: include_24hr_vol
parameters.description: true/false to include 24hr_vol, default: false

parameters.name: include_24hr_change
parameters.description: true/false to include 24hr_change, default: false

parameters.name: include_last_updated_at
parameters.description: true/false to include last_updated_at of price, default: false

parameters.name: precision
parameters.description: full or any value between 0 - 18 to specify decimal place for currency price value

200.description: price(s) of cryptocurrency

get.summary: List all supported coins price, market cap, volume, and market related data
get.description:
Use this to obtain all the coins market data (price, market cap, volume), per page.
Note: when both 'category' and 'ids' parameters are supplied, the 'category' parameter takes precedence over the 'ids' parameter. Cache / Update Frequency: every 45 seconds

parameters.name: vs_currency
parameters.description: The target currency of market data (usd, eur, jpy, etc.)

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: The ids of the coin, comma separated crytocurrency symbols (base). refers to `/coins/list`.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: filter by coin category. Refer to /coin/categories/list

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: valid values: market_cap_asc, market_cap_desc, volume_asc, volume_desc, id_asc, id_desc sort results by field.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description:
valid values: 1..250
 Total results per page

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page through results

parameters.name: sparkline
parameters.description: Include sparkline 7 days data (eg. true, false)

parameters.name: price_change_percentage
parameters.description: Include price change percentage in 1h, 24h, 7d, 14d, 30d, 200d, 1y (eg. '`1h,24h,7d`' comma-separated, invalid values will be discarded)

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: valid values: ar, bg, cs, da, de, el, en, es, fi, fr, he, hi, hr, hu, id, it, ja, ko, lt, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, ru, sk, sl, sv, th, tr, uk, vi, zh, zh-tw

parameters.name: precision
parameters.description: full or any value between 0 - 18 to specify decimal place for currency price value

200.description: List all coins with market data

get.summary: Get current data (name, price, market, ... including exchange tickers) for a coin
get.description:
Get current data (name, price, market, ... including exchange tickers) for a coin.

**IMPORTANT**: Ticker object is limited to 100 items, to get more tickers, use `/coins/{id}/tickers` Ticker `is_stale` is true when ticker that has not been updated/unchanged from the exchange for more than 8 hours. Ticker `is_anomaly` is true if ticker's price is outliered by our system. You are responsible for managing how you want to display these information (e.g. footnote, different background, change opacity, hide) Note: to check if a price is stale, please refer to `last_updated` of the price. Dictionary:
  • last: latest unconverted price in the respective pair target currency
  • volume: unconverted 24h trading volume in the respective pair target currency
  • converted_last: latest converted price in BTC, ETH, and USD
  • converted_volume: converted 24h trading volume in BTC, ETH, and USD
  • timestamp: returns the last time that the price has changed
  • last_traded_at: returns the last time that the price has changed
  • last_fetch_at: returns the last time we call the API
    • Cache / Update Frequency: every 60 seconds Data for Twitter, Telegram and Reddit will be updated on daily basis.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: pass the coin id (can be obtained from /coins) eg. bitcoin

parameters.name: localization
parameters.description: Include all localized languages in response (true/false) [default: true]

parameters.name: tickers
parameters.description: Include tickers data (true/false) [default: true]

parameters.name: market_data
parameters.description: Include market_data (true/false) [default: true]

parameters.name: community_data
parameters.description: Include community_data data (true/false) [default: true]

parameters.name: developer_data
parameters.description: Include developer_data data (true/false) [default: true]

parameters.name: sparkline
parameters.description: Include sparkline 7 days data (eg. true, false) [default: false]

200.description: Get current data for a coin

get.summary: Get coin tickers (paginated to 100 items)
get.description:
Get coin tickers (paginated to 100 items)

**IMPORTANT**: Ticker `is_stale` is true when ticker that has not been updated/unchanged from the exchange for more than 8 hours. Ticker `is_anomaly` is true if ticker's price is outliered by our system. You are responsible for managing how you want to display these information (e.g. footnote, different background, change opacity, hide) Dictionary:
  • last: latest unconverted price in the respective pair target currency
  • volume: unconverted 24h trading volume in the respective pair target currency
  • converted_last: latest converted price in BTC, ETH, and USD
  • converted_volume: converted 24h trading volume in BTC, ETH, and USD
  • timestamp: returns the last time that the price has changed
  • last_traded_at: returns the last time that the price has changed
  • last_fetch_at: returns the last time we call the API
    • Cache / Update Frequency: every 2 minutes

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: pass the coin id (can be obtained from /coins/list) eg. bitcoin

parameters.name: exchange_ids
parameters.description: filter results by exchange_ids (ref: v3/exchanges/list)

parameters.name: include_exchange_logo
parameters.description: flag to show exchange_logo. valid values: true, false

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page through results

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: valid values: trust_score_desc (default), trust_score_asc and volume_desc

parameters.name: depth
parameters.description: flag to show 2% orderbook depth. i.e., cost_to_move_up_usd and cost_to_move_down_usd. valid values: true, false

200.description: Get coin tickers

get.summary: Get historical data (price, market cap, 24hr volume, ..) at a given date for a coin.
get.description:
Get historical data (price, market cap, 24hr volume, ..) at a given date for a coin.
The data returned is at 00:00:00 UTC.

The last completed UTC day (00:00) is available 35 minutes after midnight on the next UTC day (00:35).

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: pass the coin id (can be obtained from /coins) eg. bitcoin

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date of data snapshot in dd-mm-yyyy eg. 30-12-2022

parameters.name: localization
parameters.description: Set to false to exclude localized languages in response

200.description: Get historical data at a given date for a coin

get.summary: Get historical market data include price, market cap, and 24h volume (granularity auto)
get.description:
Get historical market data include price, market cap, and 24h volume (granularity auto) Data granularity is automatic (cannot be adjusted)
  • 1 day from current time = 5 minute interval data
  • 2 - 90 days from current time = hourly data
  • above 90 days from current time = daily data (00:00 UTC)
 Cache based on days range:
  • 1 day = 30 seconds cache
  • 2-90 days = 30 minutes cache
  • 90 days = 12 hours cache

The last completed UTC day (00:00) is available 35 minutes after midnight on the next UTC day (00:35). The cache will always expire at 00:40 UTC.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: pass the coin id (can be obtained from /coins) eg. bitcoin

parameters.name: vs_currency
parameters.description: The target currency of market data (usd, eur, jpy, etc.)

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: Data up to number of days ago (eg. 1,14,30,max)

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: Data interval. Possible value: daily

parameters.name: precision
parameters.description: full or any value between 0 - 18 to specify decimal place for currency price value

200.description: Get historical market data include price, market cap, and 24h volume

get.summary: Get historical market data include price, market cap, and 24h volume within a range of timestamp (granularity auto)
get.description:
Get historical market data include price, market cap, and 24h volume (granularity auto) Data granularity is automatic (cannot be adjusted)
  • 1 day from current time = 5 minute interval data
  • 2 - 90 days of date range = hourly data
  • above 90 days of date range = daily data (00:00 UTC)
 Cache / Update Frequency: every 5 minutes. The last completed UTC day (00:00) is available 35 minutes after midnight on the next UTC day (00:35).

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: pass the coin id (can be obtained from /coins) eg. bitcoin

parameters.name: vs_currency
parameters.description: The target currency of market data (usd, eur, jpy, etc.)

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: From date in UNIX Timestamp (eg. 1392577232)

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: To date in UNIX Timestamp (eg. 1422577232)

parameters.name: precision
parameters.description: full or any value between 0 - 18 to specify decimal place for currency price value

200.description: Get historical market data include price, market cap, and 24h volume

get.summary: Get coin's OHLC
get.description:
Candle's body - data granularity is automatic (cannot be adjusted for public api users):
  • 1 - 2 days: 30 minutes
  • 3 - 30 days: 4 hours
  • 31 days and beyond: 4 days

Daily candle interval parameter is available for paid plan users only (Analyst/Lite/Pro/Enterprise), use interval=daily parameter in your request:

  • 'daily' interval: available for 1/7/14/30/90/180 days
Cache / Update Frequency: every 30 minutes The last completed UTC day (00:00) is available 35 minutes after midnight on the next UTC day (00:35).

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: pass the coin id (can be obtained from /coins/list) eg. bitcoin

parameters.name: vs_currency
parameters.description: The target currency of market data (usd, eur, jpy, etc.)

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: Data up to number of days ago (1/7/14/30/90/180/365/max)

parameters.name: precision
parameters.description: full or any value between 0 - 18 to specify decimal place for currency price value

200.description:
successful operation

[
1594382400000 (time),
1.1 (open),
 2.2 (high),
 3.3 (low),
 4.4 (close)
]

get.summary: Get exchange volume in BTC and top 100 tickers only
get.description:
Get exchange volume in BTC and tickers.
For derivatives (e.g. bitmex, binance_futures), please use `/derivatives/exchange/{id}` endpoint.

**IMPORTANT**: Ticker object is limited to 100 items, to get more tickers, use `/exchanges/{id}/tickers` Ticker `is_stale` is true when ticker that has not been updated/unchanged from the exchange for more than 8 hours. Ticker `is_anomaly` is true if ticker's price is outliered by our system. You are responsible for managing how you want to display these information (e.g. footnote, different background, change opacity, hide) Dictionary:
  • last: latest unconverted price in the respective pair target currency
  • volume: unconverted 24h trading volume in the respective pair target currency
  • converted_last: latest converted price in BTC, ETH, and USD
  • converted_volume: converted 24h trading volume in BTC, ETH, and USD
  • timestamp: returns the last time that the price has changed
  • last_traded_at: returns the last time that the price has changed
  • last_fetch_at: returns the last time we call the API
    • Cache / Update Frequency: every 60 seconds

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: pass the exchange id (can be obtained from /exchanges/list) eg. binance

200.description: Get exchange volume in BTC and top 100 tickers
